content: 1-6 of cable panel twice k16 fingertip cuff change to smaller needles rnds 1-5 8 *k1 p1 repeat from * to eor bind off in pattern use yarn needles to weave in ends don t forget to finish the thumbs finishing the thumbs use smaller needles place the 9 11 reserved sts on dpns join yarn k9 11 sts then pick up and knit 5 7 sts pm for beginning of round rnds 1-5 7 *k1 p1 repeat from * to eor bind off in pattern and use yarn needle to weave in ends the white stag mitts v 12092023 copyright lisa uotinen 2023 you are free to use this pattern to make and sell please credit tinker creek then k2 from cn 2/2 lc slip 2 sts to cn and hold in front k2 then k2 from cn written instructions round 1 p2 k4 2/2 rc 2/2 lc k4 p2 round 2 p2 k16 p2 round 3 p2 k2 2/2 rc k4 2/2 lc k2 p2 round 4 p2 k16 p2 round 5 p2 2/2 rc k8 2/2 lc p2 round 6 p2 k16 p2 the white stag mitts v 12092023 copyright lisa uotinen 2023 you are free to use this pattern to make and sell please credit tinker creek it without my permission you are helping to support pattern designers and makers thank you hello i m lisa uotinen from roanoke virginia my passion is designing modern and stylish handknits and providing for you an enjoyable knitting experience from the first cast-on to the final beautifully finished piece one of my top priorities is to write clear and understandable patterns with detailed instructions stitch charts video tutorials and other resources to ensure that your knitting experience is enjoyable and informative additionally i m always available by email to answer any specific
